channel.title: How To Add Mods & Admins to your server
channel.description: I opened up the file, I went to characters I clicked on the name and I put 0-2 (Didn't work) so then I put 2 (Didn't work again). Anyway I saved the file and when I opened it back up again it still had 0 next to it I would really appreciate it if you people tell me how to add mods and admins to my server thanks :)

item.title: How To Add Mods & Admins to your server
item.dc:creator: @azza123 azza123
item.description:
@azza123 wrote:

what youve got to do is find the list of mods and admins etc. in your client.java and then add your name to the top and set your rights, and then save compile and re-run your server, all dun :D:D hope i helped

Read full topic
item.source: How To Add Mods & Admins to your server

item.title: How To Add Mods & Admins to your server
item.dc:creator: @sparkz2k7 sparkz2k7
item.description:
@sparkz2k7 wrote:

Log Out On Your Character Open Your Source File Find The File “Characters” Click On Your Name This Should Come Up

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = (Your Name)
character-password = (Your Pass)

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 2964
character-posy = 3382
character-rights = 1 <-------------- Change This To 1 for Mod 2 for Admin 3 for Owner
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = 127.0.0.1

When Done Click SAVE

Hope This Helped You[br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2007, 05:29:18 AM[/size][hr]I Dont Get A Thank Yoo?
Or Even A Noobish Offering Me A Admin Job :l

Skeen !

Read full topic

ok owner I did as you told me my person was logged out I opened u pthat character file it saved nothing happened to it when I closed it but when I tried to log in it said erroe connecting to server and I clicked log in again it said your player it already online. I still don;'t get wats wrong

item.title: How To Add Mods & Admins to your server
item.dc:creator: @OWNER_2007 OWNER 2007
item.description:
@OWNER_2007 wrote:

Either go to character file, (make sure the char is logged off) click on the name, change the rights from 0 to 1 or 2 or 3, save, close and log in.
Another way is to find a file in the server called staff.txt or administators.txt or mods.txt (I cant remember) and add your name into there. All done

Read full topic
